controller

Class InteractionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.InteractionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHighLevelController

    public class InteractionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHighLevelController

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InteractionController()
      constructs an empty interactionController initialises a new list of subwindows initialises an active subwindow initialises a map with DiagramSubwindow as key, and a list of DialogBoxes as entry

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionForEachSubwindow(Action action)
      if the param action is not a DialogBoxOpenedAction handle the param action for each subwindow except the active subwindow else make a new dialogBox and add it to the list of subwindows
      void addSubwindow(Subwindow subwindow)
      adds a diagramSubwindow and sets it active
      void addToMap(DiagramSubwindow diagramSubwindow, DialogBox dialogBox)
      adds a dialogbox to the given diagramSubwindow if the diagramSubwindow is not in the map, it adds the diagramSubwindow to the map
      void deleteInMap(DiagramSubwindow diagramSubwindow)
      deletes a diagramSubwindow in the map, including all the dialogboxes for that diagramSubwindow
      void deleteInMap(DialogBox dialogBox)
      deletes a DialogBox in the map
      DiagramSubwindow getActiveDiagramSubwindow() 
      Subwindow getActiveSubwindow() 
      Subwindow getAppropriateSubwindow(java.awt.geom.Point2D clickedLocation)
      returns the subwindow with the highest level
      java.util.List<DialogBox> getCorrespondingDialogBoxes(DiagramSubwindow diagramSubwindow) 
      Subwindow getHighestLevelSubwindow() 
      java.util.HashMap<DiagramSubwindow,java.util.List<DialogBox>> getMap() 
      java.util.List<Subwindow> getSubwindows() 
      void handleKeyEvent(KeyEvent keyEvent)
      handles a key event if keyEvent is CTRLD: copy the active diagramSubwindow if it's not null if keyEvent is CTRLN: create a new diagramSubwindow else: get the action from the activeSubwindow and do it for every diagramSubwindow in the list
      void handleMouseEvent(MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      handles MouseEvent that affects the diagramSubwindow | if dragged == false, check if diagramSubwindow currently is being dragged (update the dragging boolean) | if dragged == true, check the mouseEventType | if RELEASE, pass the mouseEvent to activeDiagramSubwindow and set dragging == false | if LEFTCLICK, set dragging == false | else, do nothing | otherwise the appropriate diagramSubwindow that was clicked | if LEFTCLICK, do nothing | else if a diagramSubwindow is clicked set it as the active one get the coordinates of the click on the diagramSubwindow, relative to the diagramSubwindow pass the mouseEvent to the appropriate diagramSubwindow and do this action for each diagramSubwindow
      boolean isDragging() 
      void removeSubwindow(Subwindow subwindow)
      remove a diagramSubwindow and sets the highest level subwindow active if it is a DiagramSubwindow, the activeDiagramSubwindow is set to null
      void setActiveSubwindow(Subwindow activeSubwindow)
      sets the active subwindow to the param
      void setMap(java.util.HashMap<DiagramSubwindow,java.util.List<DialogBox>> map)
      sets the map with DiagramSubwindow as key, and a list of DialogBoxes as entry to the param
      void setSubwindows(java.util.List<Subwindow> subwindows)
      sets the list of subwindows to the param

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • addToMap

        public void addToMap(DiagramSubwindow diagramSubwindow,
                     DialogBox dialogBox)
        adds a dialogbox to the given diagramSubwindow if the diagramSubwindow is not in the map, it adds the diagramSubwindow to the map
        Parameters:
        diagramSubwindow, - where the dialogbox should be added to
        dialogBox, - to be added to the given diagramSubwindow

      • removeSubwindow

        public void removeSubwindow(Subwindow subwindow)
        remove a diagramSubwindow and sets the highest level subwindow active if it is a DiagramSubwindow, the activeDiagramSubwindow is set to null
        Parameters:
        subwindow - the diagramSubwindow to remove

        Parameters:

      • getActiveDiagramSubwindow

        public DiagramSubwindow getActiveDiagramSubwindow()
        Returns:
        active diagramSubwindow

      • handleKeyEvent

        public void handleKeyEvent(KeyEvent keyEvent)
                    throws DomainException,
                           UIException
        handles a key event if keyEvent is CTRLD: copy the active diagramSubwindow if it's not null if keyEvent is CTRLN: create a new diagramSubwindow else: get the action from the activeSubwindow and do it for every diagramSubwindow in the list
        Specified by:
        handleKeyEvent in interface IHighLevelController
        Parameters:
        keyEvent - the keyEvent to handle
        Throws:
        DomainException
        UIException

      • handleMouseEvent

        public void handleMouseEvent(MouseEvent mouseEvent)
        handles MouseEvent that affects the diagramSubwindow | if dragged == false, check if diagramSubwindow currently is being dragged (update the dragging boolean) | if dragged == true, check the mouseEventType | if RELEASE, pass the mouseEvent to activeDiagramSubwindow and set dragging == false | if LEFTCLICK, set dragging == false | else, do nothing | otherwise the appropriate diagramSubwindow that was clicked | if LEFTCLICK, do nothing | else if a diagramSubwindow is clicked set it as the active one get the coordinates of the click on the diagramSubwindow, relative to the diagramSubwindow pass the mouseEvent to the appropriate diagramSubwindow and do this action for each diagramSubwindow
        Specified by:
        handleMouseEvent in interface IHighLevelController
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - the mouseEvent to handle

      • actionForEachSubwindow

        public void actionForEachSubwindow(Action action)
        if the param action is not a DialogBoxOpenedAction handle the param action for each subwindow except the active subwindow else make a new dialogBox and add it to the list of subwindows
        Parameters:
        action -

      • getAppropriateSubwindow

        public Subwindow getAppropriateSubwindow(java.awt.geom.Point2D clickedLocation)
        returns the subwindow with the highest level
        Parameters:
        clickedLocation - the location of the click
        Returns:
        subwindow if a subwindow is clicked, null otherwise
